thread.title: Louis Tomlinson heaps praise on Zayn Malik after former 1D star scoops two Brit Awards nominations
thread.title_full: Louis Tomlinson heaps praise on Zayn Malik after former 1D star scoops two Brit Awards nominations

author: Zoe Shenton
title: Louis Tomlinson heaps praise on Zayn Malik after former 1D star scoops two Brit Awards nominations

organizations.name: clean bandit ft. sean paul & anne-marie

text:
Louis Tomlinson heaps praise on Zayn Malik after former 1D star scoops two Brit Awards nominations Ex-One Direction star Zayn received two nods on Saturday Share An absolute smash: Louis praises Zayn (Photo: Getty) Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Louis Tomlinson heaped praise on his former bandmate Zayn Malik after he scooped two Brit Awards nominations on Saturday. 
The group's video History and their former bandmember Zayn's debut solo single Pillowtalk were both nominated in the Best British Video category, with the winner to be announced at a ceremony at The O2 in London on February 22. 
Zayn has also been nominated for British Single of the Year for Pillowtalk and speaking about his single, former bandmate Louis Tomlinson said: "Zayn had an absolute smash with Pillowtalk. 
"It’s a weird feeling to see us all on our own but it’s also nice to feel that you’ve got the support of the other lads.” Louis Tomlinson 
The pair had a very public falling out after Zayn quit the band, with them clashing over Zayn's relationship with music producer Naughty Boy. 
Zayn's competitors in the category include Clean Bandit Ft. Sean Paul & Anne-Marie (Rockabye), Tinie Tempah Ft. Zara Larsson (Girls Like), Jonas Blue Ft. Dakota (Fast Car), James Arthur (Say You Won't Let Go), Alan Walker (Faded), Coldplay (Hymn for the Weekend), Calum Scott (Dancing on my Own), Little Mix (Shout Out To My Ex) and Calvin Harris Ft. Rihanna (This is What You Came For). 
Elsewhere, David Bowie - who passed away in January 2016 after a secret battle with cancer - has been nominated for British Male Solo Artist, alongside Craig David, Skepta, Kano and Michael Kiwanuka. (Photo: Getty Images) Brit Awards 2017 nominations REVEALED: Little Mix and Rihanna score most nods 
Bowie's second posthumous nomination comes in the Mastercard Album of the Year category for Blackstar. 
And Ellie Goulding will compete against Lianne La Havas, Anohni, Nao and Emeli Sande for British Female Solo Artist. 
Anne-Marie, Skepta, Rag'N'Bone Man, Blossoms and Stormzy are up for British Breakthrough Act, while Bastille, Biffy Clyro, Radiohead, The 1975 and Little Mix are up for British Group. 
In total Little Mix have received three nominations, leading the way alongside Skepta, who has the same amount. Like us on Facebook
